hero.subtitle: Green Empire Lawn & Landscape is your complete exterior maintenance solution. We clean, organize, and transform the outside of your home so you never have to hire multiple contractors again.

services.title: Complete Exterior Maintenance
services.subtitle: From lawn mowing to garden design — one team, one call, one invoice. We handle everything outside your door so you can enjoy your property stress-free.

mowing.title: Lawn Mowing & Maintenance
mowing.desc: Weekly or bi-weekly mowing, precision edging, trimming, and blowing. We keep your lawn looking sharp and healthy all season long.

cleanup.title: Yard Cleanup & Leaf Removal
cleanup.desc: Spring and fall cleanups, debris removal, leaf collection, and property tidying. Start every season with a clean slate.

gutters.title: Gutter Cleaning
gutters.desc: Thorough gutter and downspout cleaning to prevent water damage, foundation issues, and pest problems. Recommended 2x per year.

pressure.title: Driveway & Surface Cleaning
pressure.desc: Professional pressure washing for driveways, walkways, patios, and exterior surfaces. Restore your curb appeal instantly.

garden.title: Garden Design & Planting
garden.desc: Custom garden layouts, flower bed design, shrub installation, and seasonal plantings. Transform your outdoor space into a showpiece.

mulching.title: Mulching & Bed Maintenance
mulching.desc: Fresh mulch installation, bed edging, weed prevention, and shrub trimming. Keep your landscape beds looking polished year-round.

packages.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
packages.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your property. All plans include our satisfaction guarantee and consistent, reliable service.

whyUs.title: Why Homeowners Choose Green Empire
whyUs.subtitle: Stop juggling multiple contractors. We handle everything outside your door with one team, one invoice, and consistent quality.
whyUs.solution1: One trusted team for all exterior services
whyUs.solution2: Consistent quality with the same crew every visit
whyUs.solution3: Single monthly invoice — simple and predictable

howItWorks.title: Getting Started Is Easy
howItWorks.subtitle: From first call to beautiful property in three simple steps.

step1.title: Request Your Free Quote
step1.desc: Tell us about your property and the services you need. We'll schedule a free on-site assessment at your convenience.

step2.title: We Assess & Plan
step2.desc: Our team visits your property, evaluates what's needed, and creates a custom service plan tailored to your goals and budget.

step3.title: Enjoy Your Property
step3.desc: Sit back and relax. We handle everything on a reliable schedule so your property always looks its absolute best.

seasonal.title: Every Season, We've Got You Covered
seasonal.subtitle: Your property's needs change with the seasons. Our services adapt to keep your exterior perfect all year.

review1.text: Green Empire transformed our yard completely. We used to hire three different people for lawn, gutters, and pressure washing. Now it's all one team, one bill. The quality is incredible and they show up like clockwork.
review1.name: Sarah M.

review2.text: Best landscaping service we've ever used. The crew is professional, thorough, and actually cares about how the property looks. Our neighbors constantly ask who does our yard. Highly recommend!
review2.name: James R.

review3.text: I love the Complete Care package. No more worrying about seasonal cleanups, fertilization schedules, or finding someone to clean the gutters. Green Empire handles it all and my yard has never looked better.
review3.name: Linda P.

serviceArea.title: Serving Your Community
serviceArea.desc: We proudly serve residential and commercial properties across the greater area. Contact us to confirm service availability in your neighborhood.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: We serve residential and commercial properties across the greater metropolitan area. Contact us with your address and we'll confirm availability. We're expanding our service area regularly.
faq.q2: How quickly can you start service?
faq.a2: Most new clients are scheduled within 3-5 business days of their initial consultation. For urgent needs like storm cleanup, we offer priority scheduling within 24-48 hours when possible.
faq.q3: Do I need to be home during service?
faq.a3: No! Most of our clients aren't home during service visits. We just need access to the areas we'll be working on. We'll send you a notification when we arrive and when we finish, along with photos of the completed work.
faq.q4: What if it rains on my scheduled service day?
faq.a4: We monitor weather closely. If conditions don't allow safe, quality work, we'll reschedule within 24-48 hours at no extra charge. We never do subpar work just to keep a schedule.
faq.q5: Can I customize my service package?
faq.a5: Absolutely! Our packages are starting points. We can add or remove services to create the perfect plan for your property. Just tell us what you need and we'll build a custom quote.
faq.a6: Yes. Green Empire Lawn & Landscape is fully licensed and insured, including general liability and workers' compensation coverage. Your property and our team are always protected.

finalCta.title: Ready for a Property You'll Love?
finalCta.line1: Stop stressing about your yard. Stop hiring multiple contractors.
finalCta.line2: One call. Complete exterior care. Guaranteed satisfaction.
finalCta.line3: Your free quote is just a click away.
finalCta.disclaimer: Free estimates. No obligation. Satisfaction guaranteed on every service.
